languages.text: "Слово повелевает всем в мироздании. Боги управляли вселенной, используя слова силы. Когда-то и смертным было даровано право знать их, но те времена умерли вместе с миром".
"Words command all of existence. The gods ruled the universe using words of power. There was a time when mortals, too, were granted knowledge of them, but that time died along with the world."
languages.original_text: "Слово повелевает всем в мироздании. Боги управляли вселенной, используя слова силы. Когда-то и смертным было даровано право знать их, но те времена умерли вместе с миром".

traits.locale_text: "Words command all of existence. Gods ruled the universe using words of power. There was a time when mortals, too, were granted knowledge of them, but that time died along with the world."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: 「あらゆる存在に命令をくだす言葉だ。神々は言葉の力で宇宙を支配した。人間が神々の知識を授かった時代も同じだったが、そんな時代は惑星と共に滅びた」
languages.original_text: "Words command all of existence. The gods ruled the universe using words of power. There was a time when mortals, too, were granted knowledge of them, but that time died along with the world."

traits.locale_text: 「あらゆる存在に命令をくだす言葉だ。神々は言葉の力で宇宙を支配した。人間が神々の知識を授かった時代も同じだったが、そんな時代は惑星と共に滅びた」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: “咒语主宰着一切存在，诸神用带有力量的咒语统治宇宙。曾几何时，凡人也被赋予了关于咒语的知识，但那个时代已经随着世界的毁灭一同消逝了。”
languages.original_text: "Words command all of existence. The gods ruled the universe using words of power. There was a time when mortals, too, were granted knowledge of them, but that time died along with the world."

traits.locale_text: “咒语主宰着一切存在，诸神用带有力量的咒语统治宇宙。曾几何时，凡人也被赋予了关于咒语的知识，但那个时代已经随着世界的毁灭一同消逝了。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: « Les mots commandent à toute l'existence. Les dieux utilisaient des mots de puissance pour régner sur l'univers. Il fut un temps où les mortels aussi les connaissaient, mais ce n'est plus le cas depuis que le monde a été détruit. »
languages.original_text: "Words command all of existence. The gods ruled the universe using words of power. There was a time when mortals, too, were granted knowledge of them, but that time died along with the world."

traits.locale_text: « Les mots commandent à toute l'existence. Les dieux utilisaient des mots de puissance pour régner sur l'univers. Il fut un temps où les mortels aussi les connaissaient, mais ce n'est plus le cas depuis que le monde a été détruit. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: «Las palabras tenían un dominio absoluto sobre toda la existencia. Los dioses controlaban el universo usando palabras de poder. En el pasado, los humanos también conocían esas palabras, pero esos tiempos murieron junto con el mundo».
languages.original_text: "Words command all of existence. The gods ruled the universe using words of power. There was a time when mortals, too, were granted knowledge of them, but that time died along with the world."

traits.locale_text: «Las palabras tenían un dominio absoluto sobre toda la existencia. Los dioses controlaban el universo usando palabras de poder. En el pasado, los humanos también conocían esas palabras, pero esos tiempos murieron junto con el mundo».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Worte befehligen alles, was existiert. Die Götter haben mit Worten der Macht über das Universum geherrscht. Es gab eine Zeit, in der auch Sterblichen das Wissen um die Worte gewährt wurde, doch diese Zeit ist gemeinsam mit der Welt gestorben."
languages.original_text: "Words command all of existence. The gods ruled the universe using words of power. There was a time when mortals, too, were granted knowledge of them, but that time died along with the world."

traits.locale_text: "Worte befehligen alles, was existiert. Die Götter haben mit Worten der Macht über das Universum geherrscht. Es gab eine Zeit, in der auch Sterblichen das Wissen um die Worte gewährt wurde, doch diese Zeit ist gemeinsam mit der Welt gestorben."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Sözcükler, tüm varoluşa hükmeder. Tanrılar evreni güçlü sözcüklerle yönetirdi. Onlara dair bilgilerin ölümlülere de sunulduğu bir zaman olmuştu. Tabii o günler, dünyayla birlikte öldü."
languages.original_text: "Words command all of existence. The gods ruled the universe using words of power. There was a time when mortals, too, were granted knowledge of them, but that time died along with the world."

traits.locale_text: "Sözcükler tüm varoluşa hükmeder. Tanrılar evreni güçlü sözcüklerle yönetirdi. Onlara dair bilgilerin ölümlülere de sunulduğu bir zaman olmuştu ancak o günler, dünyayla birlikte öldü."
traits.speaker: Chief
